channel.title: RS Developer's Emulator
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yyHGK.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7T7wz.png[/img]
Before everything else, am Eselyium and this is a continuation of my earlier Dev Tool Project. This is an advanced version of that. Way advanced that it is not going to be a tool but an emulator. Yes of course i will be releasing this and i will be upgrading it as time goes on. I noticed there are a lot of frameworks out there, Apollo, Shard, Delta(BOSS), Project Insanity, Hyperion, Azure(Rune Source) & Light Rune(love it ). Because of this i will be making the Emulator compatible with all of them for example, xml files and cfg files.
Project Overall Progress: |||||||||||||||||||| [color=red] Main BG Buttons & Hovers Messages & Correct Spelling (Hey am not perfect) English Spanish French More to come.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ODXyl.png[/img] Main BG & Frame Work Buttons & Hovers Correct Saving & Edits (All Versions) Path Configuration Messages & Correct Spelling
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0aV46.png[/img] Main BG & Frame Work Buttons & Hovers Correct Saving & Edits (All Versions)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CXoBv.png[/img] Frame Work FINAL! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BcclT.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O1o7S.png[/img] [8/24/2012] Project Thread Finished [8/24/2012] Updated Main Background [8/25/2012] Started Frame Work [8/25/2012] Started Working On Buttons [8/25/2012] Started Working On Languages [8/26/2012] Finished Frame Work
Please Do Support:
[CODE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pXemL.png[/IMG] [/CODE]

item.title: RS Developer's Emulator
item.dc:creator: @Iscn Iscn
item.description:
@Iscn wrote:

yyHGK.png705×66

Before everything else, am Eselyium and this is a continuation of my earlier Dev Tool Project.
This is an advanced version of that. Way advanced that it is not going to be a tool but an emulator.
Yes of course i will be releasing this and i will be upgrading it as time goes on.
I noticed there are a lot of frameworks out there, Apollo, Shard, Delta(BOSS), Project Insanity, Hyperion, Azure(Rune Source) & Light Rune(love it ).
Because of this i will be making the Emulator compatible with all of them for example, xml files and cfg files.

Project Overall Progress: ||||||||||||||||||||
[color=red] Main BG
Buttons & Hovers
Messages & Correct Spelling (Hey am not perfect)
English
Spanish
French
More to come.
